text: To make this into a bug report would require you to define what you mean by "works" and "don't", and to give adequate context.  Please use a user support forum to help figure it out.

creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/configuring.html

Lines that begin with the hash character "#" are considered comments, and are ignored. Comments may not be included on a line after a configuration directive. Blank lines and white space occurring before a directive are ignored, so you may indent directives for clarity.
